TEXT.TITLE: KIRIN BREWERY CO LTD <KNBW.T> YEAR TO JANUARY 31
TEXT.BODY: Parent shr 37.12 yen vs 34.97 Div 9.50 yen vs 7.50 Net 33.34 billion vs 31.05 billion Current 79.30 billion vs 73.32 billion Operating 72.13 billion vs 65.53 billion Sales 1,222 billion vs 1,211 billion Outstanding shrs 897.96 mln vs 887.76 mln NOTE - 1986/87 dividend included two yen bonus dividend to mark 80th anniversary. Company forecast for current year is parent shr 37.86 yen, div 7.50 yen, net 34 billion, current 81 billion and sales 1,250 billion. REUTER
